review.title: “Difficult Time”
review.pros: Pros – Plenty of Opportunity for growth and the owner is a fantastic salesman
review.cons: Cons – The industry is facing difficult times in that everyone is trying to reduce transportation costs and organizations are trying to manage cash by taking longer to pay.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Do not walk into meetings with current and prospective clients from a position of fear and weakness. You provide an excellent service and deserve to demand a rate that will meet your obligations.
